entries.title: Developer needed to animate a SVG file with a wave effect - Upwork

title_detail.value: Developer needed to animate a SVG file with a wave effect - Upwork

entries.summary:
Hello,

I search a Developer who can animate the .svg - file in the attachement like a wave
I use the file for this development website: https://kronberg.ch.cms.tso.ch/en/home-kopie.html

The border of my element should be dynamic.

Important:
- all the code is inside the svg-file
- animationspeed should be adjustable
- animation-repeat should be adjustable or set as infinite.
- animation should work on first-load of the website.
- animation should work on scroll up and scroll down the website.


Example for inspiration:
https://heliasoils.com/ -> See also wave-example.png at the attachement
https://codepen.io/tedmcdo/pen/PqxKXg
https://lesanimals.digital/#/intro -> Loader .gif

Thanks for your apply and your solving case.

Budget: $150
Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:17 UTC
Category: Web Design
Skills:Website Development, JavaScript, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, CSS3, Visual Design, CSS, Interaction Design
Skills: Website Development, JavaScript, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, CSS3, Visual Design, CSS, Interaction Design
Country: Switzerland

entries.title: AEM Developer Needed for migration project - Upwork

title_detail.value: AEM Developer Needed for migration project - Upwork

entries.summary:
Working hours from 8.30 PM IST - 5.30 AM IST for 3 - 6 months.
PRIMARY FUNCTION:
AEM developer should assist the company-wide CMS migration and website redesign and will be responsible for working with development teams to ensure requirements are covered.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
• 3+ years of AEM experience
• 3+ years of experience in designing, developing, deploying sites using AEM
• 3+ years experience developing applications, templates, and components for the Adobe AEM/CQ product (WCM, DAM, CQSE, CRX)
• 3+ years experience customizing workflows and integration with other enterprise systems
• 3+ years experience in AEM architecture – Sling, OSGi, Oak, Sightly
• 3+ experience in building responsive websites on AEM
• 3+ years experience of AEM sites, assets & forms
• Working knowledge of the following: RESTful web services, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, HTML, CSS, AMQ/RabbitMQ or similar messaging system
• 3+ years of experience in UI development with AngularJS or React or EmberJS, React is preferred.
• 2+ years of experience in Java/J2EE
• Create technical design documentation.
• Collaborate with other application developers during software design and build.

QUALIFICATIONS:
• Bachelor’s Degree in MIS, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is required
• Prior Content Management System (CMS) project experience is required
• Excellent knowledge of the landscape of CMS systems and processes
• Experience working with internet sites for large global companies
• Previous experience with agile/lean processes and techniques (scrums etc..)
• Excellent communication skills coupled with a strong technical understanding is required for this role
• Must be able to educate technical concepts to all levels of technical background end users
• Experience supporting delivery of meetings by asking clarifying/follow up CMS processes/systems related questions


Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:16 UTC
Category: CMS Customization
Country: United States
>click to apply

entries.title: Change to my current EA - Upwork

title_detail.value: Change to my current EA - Upwork

entries.summary:
I currently have source code for my own EA which trades on a bracket pip system however i want to change it to alllow me trade using the following system

Enter LONG when the Yellow EMA crosses the Red EMA from underneath.
RSI must be approaching 50 from the BOTTOM and cross 50 to warrant entry.

Enter SHORT when the Yellow EMA crosses the Red EMA from the top.
RSI must be approaching 50 from the TOP and cross 50 to warrant entry.

I am happy to send my source code to any developer willing to do the job to ensure my current EA can be adapted before any develop starts work

Budget: $50

Category: Back-End Development

entries.title: Update 2 apps to IOS 13 - Upwork

title_detail.value: Update 2 apps to IOS 13 - Upwork

entries.summary:
I have 2 apps in the app store. These apps are basic apps that is fetching some data from other apis. These apps were built by older versions of XCODE and now due to Apple policy they need to be upgraded to IOS 13 and compiled with the latest version. I dont want any upgrade to the apps, they just need to be updated and work with all screens as apple requested.

APPLE MESSAGE
We greatly value the worldwide developer community, and appreciate your commitment to making a difference in people’s lives through the power of technology. To accommodate developers who may need additional time to update their existing apps on the App Store, the deadline for adhering to the requirements below has been extended to June 30, 2020.

. Apps for iPhone or iPad must be built with the iOS 13 SDK or later and use an Xcode storyboard to provide the app’s launch screen.
iPhone apps must support all iPhone screens and all iPad apps must support all iPad screens.
Apps for Apple Watch must be built with the watchOS 6 SDK or later.
Apps that authenticate or set up user accounts must support Sign in with Apple if required by guideline 4.8 of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Apps in the Kids category must be in full compliance with guideline 1.3 and guideline 5.1.4. of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Apps using HTML 5 must be in full compliance with guideline 4.7 sections 4, 5, and 6 of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Thank you for your continuing efforts to serve your users during this time. If you have any questions, contact us.

Budget: $10
Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:12 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Swift, Phone, iOS
Skills: Swift, Phone, iOS
Country: Turkey
>click to apply

These apps were built by older versions of XCODE and now due to Apple policy they need to be upgraded to IOS 13 and compiled with the latest version. I dont want any upgrade to the apps, they just need to be updated and work with all screens as apple requested.

APPLE MESSAGE
We greatly value the worldwide developer community, and appreciate your commitment to making a difference in people’s lives through the power of technology. To accommodate developers who may need additional time to update their existing apps on the App Store, the deadline for adhering to the requirements below has been extended to June 30, 2020.

. Apps for iPhone or iPad must be built with the iOS 13 SDK or later and use an Xcode storyboard to provide the app’s launch screen.
iPhone apps must support all iPhone screens and all iPad apps must support all iPad screens.
Apps for Apple Watch must be built with the watchOS 6 SDK or later.
Apps that authenticate or set up user accounts must support Sign in with Apple if required by guideline 4.8 of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Apps in the Kids category must be in full compliance with guideline 1.3 and guideline 5.1.4. of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Apps using HTML 5 must be in full compliance with guideline 4.7 sections 4, 5, and 6 of the App Store Review Guidelines.
Thank you for your continuing efforts to serve your users during this time. If you have any questions, contact us.

Budget: $10

Category: Mobile App Development

entries.title: Facebook ads expert WITH PREVIOUS CASE STUDIES and proof of work for authors with books/magazines ! - Upwork

title_detail.value: Facebook ads expert WITH PREVIOUS CASE STUDIES and proof of work for authors with books/magazines ! - Upwork

entries.summary:
I run my very own Social media marketing agency and I'm looking to hire a new team member to run Facebook and IG ads for my agency.
When applying, remember that I am looking for a Facebook ad specialist and not just a copyrighter or media buyer/social media manager.

Note: we are currently in the process of onboarding a new client who owns a sports lifestyle cars based magazine so if you have previous results you have generated for similar clients that you are willing to share, this will not only provide proof that you are an expert in this field but will also majorly increase your chances of securing the job.

Within your application, I would advise you to cover all the objectives listed bellow to be considered:

1) Must show examples of ad campaign results from previous clients. This should consist of both the ad copy and metrics that were used. If you are willing to show your campaigns via screenshare, that is a massive bonus.
2) Along with the ads you must be able to create ad copy. Bare in mind that I am currently in talks with multiple companies so if you are the right person we will be bringing you regular clients to keep you busy!
3) Try and make sure your case studies are explained as best as possible.

Finally, the no.1 reason why I am placing so much emphasis on case studies and previous results is because this presents us with fresh results to LEVERAGE to get NEW CLIENTS!
This is THE MOST IMPORTANT FACTOR. This will be mutually beneficial for the both of us as I will be on boarding a new clients and you get paid as soon as the client is signed and ready to get going.

Again, someone who creates ads for the authors/magazines or who is experienced on as many social media platforms as possible such as: Facebook, Google, Instagram, Snapchat, Linkedin is ideal however if you can provide proof of outstanding previous results across any other niches, your application will be taken just as seriously.

We have massive ambition with our agency and are only after the best contractors at a reasonable price who will deliver.

Budget: $300
Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:10 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Conversion Rate Optimization, Facebook Marketing, Instagram Marketing, Internet Marketing, Lead Generation, Retargeting, Social Media Marketing, B2B, Facebook Advertising, Facebook Ad Campaign, Instagram Ad Campaign, Facebook Ads Manager, Pixel Setup & Optimization, Social Media Advertising, Video Ads

entries.title: EAT Web Content Evaluator (Native Italian) - Upwork

title_detail.value: EAT Web Content Evaluator (Native Italian) - Upwork

entries.summary:
We are hiring two native Italian website evaluators to evaluate quality and Google E-A-T (Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness) of website pages.

During this project, you will:

• Familiarise yourself with Google’s Website Quality Guidelines
• Understand the core pillars of Google Quality Ratings
• Learn our ranking system for evaluating quality factors on individual webpages
• Evaluate a set of 12 web pages
• Prepare written commentary on each website using the format we provide.
• Provide insight on the following quality aspects of the web pages:
o The Purpose of the Page
o Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness (E-A-T)
o Main content quality and amount (based on the landing page of the task URL)
o Website Information about who is responsible for main content
o Website reputation about who is responsible for main content
• Receive feedback in order to ensure that your evaluation conforms with client expectations and revise if needed

Candidates must possess the following skills in order to be considered for this project:

• High digital literacy, familiar with common Internet terminology
• Excellent spelling and grammar in English
• Superb writing skills and the ability to communicate ideas effectively and concisely in English
• Ability to think critically and evaluate webpages in an efficient, yet complete manner
• Ability to understand and follow very detailed instructions
• Good working knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Additional non-negotiable requirements:

• Must be an Italian national with native level Italian. No exceptions
• Must have a reliable internet connection
• Must have a PC or Apple laptop / desktop with Chrome installed, version 77.0.3865 (2019-09-10 release) or higher
• Must have a smartphone equipped with Pie 9.0 or higher (Android) or an iPhone with iOS 12 or higher
• Must have spell-checker activated in your native language in Excel

Further details:

If you are selected for this project, we ask that you be able to legally emit an invoice as an independent contractor in your country. You will be paid by Veem upon satisfactory completion of each evaluation cycle in USD.


Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:06 UTC
Category: Digital Marketing
Skills:Internet Research, Communication Skills, Excel
Skills: Internet Research, Communication Skills, Excel
Country: Spain
>click to apply

entries.title: Localization Expert GERMAN for Personality App - Upwork

title_detail.value: Localization Expert GERMAN for Personality App - Upwork

entries.summary:
We are an online publisher - and a hugely successful one at that! On a daily basis, we reach millions of users with our content, projects, and games, such as the Nametests Instant Game on Facebook. We are a creative team where our mission is to “make people smile”; we are committed to entertaining people and want to empower them to get the most from their valuable time on our content platforms and games.

Please check out the App you want to localize quizzes for: https://www.facebook.com/instantgames/474443516378085/

The Social Sweethearts are looking for passionate and dynamic colleagues who would like to join and become a part of our team as a Remote Localisation/Translation Manager (m/f/d) with these responsibilities:
- Responsible for localization of all DE content for DACH audience
- Manage, commission and monitor all project-translations into German
- Curate and localize EN content into German for the DACH region.
- Deduct style guide and quality criteria for German translations based on performance
- Implement and ensure best localisation measures into the German translation Team
- Give Feedback to translators about their translations, it's performance and style improvements
-Ensure daily translation amounts and turnaround times in DE are met with the help of our inhouse translation team


Your Requirements:

✔ You are a localisation expert who knows how to appeal to our audience

✔ You have already managed Upworker on Upwork

✔ You have a desire to create positive work experience for your Team

✔ You are experienced in managing and curating translations on a big scale

✔ You have good knowledge translation software

✔ You are not afraid of using a CMS and and custom-built inhouse solutions

✔ You have a organisational talent

✔ You have proficient knowledge of the english language and can communicate concisely

✔ You can send us references with your application documents

✔ You are reliable, a team player and work enthusiastically

✔ Entrepreneurial thinking, solution-oriented and independent working round off your profile


Your Task:

Support our Inhouse Translation Management Team in:

Ordering Translations on our inhouse translation platform

Curate and develop our freelance translation team

Search and hire Translators on Upwork to join our Translation Team

Onboard Translators to our translation platform and give performance feedback

Ensure translation are ordered, delivered and published correctly  





Your Technical Setup:

A facebook account is necessary (all our content is published on Facebook)

We are using Slack for internal communication

Trello as a to-do management tool

Google chrome is required as Browser

You will get access to our internal tools and translation platform (!)




Please apply if you think you a perfect match for this position.
In the following we would send you a small paid trail task to test your localization skills.


Posted On: March 30, 2020 12:05 UTC
Category: Language Localization
Skills:German, English
Skills: German, English
Country: Germany
>click to apply
